晬字的基本解释

晬
zuì
古代称婴儿满一百天或一周岁：三月能行，晬而能言。
一昼夜：“晬时脉还。”
周；周年。
古同“睟”，润泽的样子。

晬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuì］
［《廣韻》子對切，去隊，精。］
(1)周，满一周期。
(2)周岁。特指婴儿满周岁或满月、满百日。
(3)通“睟”。温润貌。参见“晬容”、“晬穆”。
(4)通“睟”。纯，纯粹。参见“晬清”。

晬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晬； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页496第24
【唐韻】子對切【集韻】【韻會】祖對切，?音䘹。【說文】周年也。【類篇】子生一歲也。一曰晬時者周時也。

晬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
晬字的起名意思

暂无。

So
Basic explanation of words
So
zuì
In ancient times, it was said that babies are 100 days old or one year old: they can do it in March, but they can speak for themselves.
All day and night: "The time pulse is still."
Week; anniversary.
Gu Tong "saw" and looked moist.
So
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuì］
["Guangyun" sub-cut, go to the team, fine. ]
(1) Week, full cycle.
(2) One year old. Specifically refers to the baby's full one year old or full moon, full 100 days.
(3) Through "睟". Gentle appearance. See "Zhu Rong", "Zhu Mu".
(4) Through "睟". Pure, pure. See "Zhu Qing".
So
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　晬; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 496 24
[Tang Yun] Sub-cutting [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Zuo-cutting,? Sound. [Said Wen] Anniversary also. [Classes] The child is one year old. On the first day, the hour is also the hour of the week.
So
